resources.string: Use date with only day and year and 300 day in each year.
Real date of first day in custom date.
Regular expression for SMS number filtering.
Regular expression for parse of spending notifications. Must have named group \u00abspending\u00bb, e.g. \u00ab+?(?\u003cspending\u003e\\d+(?:\\.\\d+)?)\u00bb. May have any other named groups.
Regular expression for parse of spending notifications. Must have named group \u00abincome\u00bb, e.g. \u00ab-(?\u003cincome\u003e\\d+(?:\\.\\d+)?)\u00bb. May have any other named groups.
Comment text. May have any regular expression placeholders, e.g. \u00ab\\g\u003cspending\u003e\u00bb.
